zdoomer.txt

Wednesday, April 11, 2001

ZDoomer V1.0

What the hell is this thing?

It's just a very simple front end for ZDoom
that I wrote for myself because I didn't like
the others I found. I imagine it would work
for other executables but I never tried.

Note that a right mouse click on some of the
buttons will popup a little help window.

I suggest putting this executable in the same
place you keep all your wads for convenience.
[[Category:Dead software]]
